body.name: Dreampark Montessori Educational Toddler Toys: Montessori Toys for 1 2 3 Years Old Boys Girls Birthday Gifts, Toddlers Toys Ages 1-2 Wooden Stack and Sort Geometric Board Blocks Toys for Kids Baby

features: SAFETY - This montessori toys for 2 year old exceeds the strict product safety tests for children's toys.

HIGH QUALITY ASSURANCE - Environmental and high quality wood, water-based paint, safe and non-toxic, mommy assured. The edges of the Stacking Geometric Board are smooth and won't hurt the baby's skin. We insist in adopt high quality craft and make delicate products attentively for kids and toddlers.

SHAPE MATCHING - The wooden base have different Numbers of columns according to different shapes, baby can pair the geometric shapes with the column in their hands. They can identify the shape and count the holes in the column to train their forebrain and hand-eye coordination ability. The cognitive simple geometric shapes, and the relationship between the blocks and set column, simultaneously exercises the baby hand eye coordination and logical thinking ability.

GEOMETRIC SHAPE COGNITION - These pieces of wood are made up of geometric figures with different colors. Not only let the child know all kinds of colors, but also let the child have a preliminary understanding of geometric figures. Enrich the baby's knowledge, and analyze the different roles of different geometric shapes in real life.

100% SATISFACTION - If anything goes wrong with your Wooden Educational Toys, or you decide it is just not for you, we will always be there with you. Now add to cart now and give your kids a surprise.

After being ventilated for a period of time, the smell will disappear quickly and kids can play with it at ease.- Avoid direct washing. Please wipe with a damp cloth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Learning while Playing! Our wooden shape stacking toy contains 4 different geometric shapes and color, with 4 cute picture designs on the board (bird, elephant, mountain, rabbit), it catchs kid’s attention and also helps to develop their sensitivities of the color.Babies can use their imagination, shape sorting toy with the building blocks to make all sorts of different model.Each shape wooden blocks has a corresponding position, our shape color sorting geometric board can help cultivate baby's hand-eye coordination, exercise color recognition and fine motor shills.

Well-made package box Each of the wooden shape stacking puzzle is well packed in a box, which is perfect as a gift for your toddlers, nephews and nieces, grandchildren, friends' kids, etc.With a box, the blocks can be easy collected, what a mess-free fun! Product Description Name: four-column shape matchingProduct category: wood productsPaint surface: water-based paintSuitable age: over 1 year oldSize: 6.9*5.7*0.47inWeight: 423g / 0.93lb NOTE: - The new wooden product may have a slight smell. After being ventilated for a period of time, the smell will disappear quickly and kids can play with it at ease.- Avoid direct washing. Please wipe with a damp cloth.

Enjoy Family Time - This is a great toy for little ones to learn. Kids can stack the blocks, spin the circle, learn animals printed on the board...endless. Parents can teach them shapes, colors, numbers and animals. - The best part about this stacking toy is that it requires parents to sit with their children, help and teach them these skills. That alone is priceless. Kids' Early Development The benefits of playing geometrical stacker: - Strenghen their sensory ability of recognizing different color and geometric shapes - To train their forebrain and improve their hand-eye combination - Improve logical thinking ability - Improve overall cognitive skills Great Gift Choice - It's suitable for many holidays and occassions like Baby Shower/ Birthday/ Christmas/ Thanksgivig Day and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great motor skills toy
reviews.reviewText: My nephew loves this puzzle toy. Keeps him entertained for hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Montessori Toddler Blocks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dexterity
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for grandchild 1 year birthday. It was perfect. Helps him practice hand eye coordination. A definite success!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My two year old grandbaby loves this toy. When he gets tired of playing with his big toys He will take this out and dump it all over me and then put it back together telling me that it’s a square a circle or rectangle and how many holes each one has in it. He will do that 8 or 10 times before he gets tired of it. Great gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that it's made out of wood but it's pretty small for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent learning toy!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 yr old granddaughter really likes this! There were so many other options on Amazon to choose from and I'm so glad I chose this one! This is perfect for her age, it's not complicated, it has bright colored wooden shapes. The pegs are sturdy and it's made really well. This is a good learning toy for hand and eye coordination and thinking skills. Highly recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two year old loves to play this puzzle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 18 month old. He is very into puzzles and I wanted to continue buying toys/gifts that keep his wheels turning. This is the perfect gift. He will sit there for at least 20-30 minutes playing with this toy, gives me enough time to throw lunch/dinner together. Would highly recommend this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent educational and fun toy for 6 months to pre-school
reviews.reviewText: This toy is excellent quality and loved by the toddlers who received it as a gift. Non toxic so baby can bite on the pieces, great for hand eye coordination and excellent for learning colors, shapes and numbers. Love this gift.
My toddler loves it. It is durable with good finishing. Weldone
My 2.6 year old daughter loves this game. Unbreakable, nice colours, easy to handle.
A bit smaller than expected but still well done.

Great toy! Smooth details, bright colors. I'm glad that I chose this stacking toy. My son also likes it. He is 13 months old and is still learning how to play with this toy, it's quite challenging for him. That's why I think it'll last for many months.
